attributes.action: Future Political Manifesto should be Law
attributes.background: Future Political Manifesto should be Law binding contract between the Political party and the electorate, breaking the Manifesto should result in the government resignation and general election called.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make breaking a manifesto against the law and trigger a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700035
